attachments.title: Figma: the collaborative interface design tool.
attachments.text: Figma keeps everyone on the same page. Focus on the work instead of fighting your tools.
attachments.fallback: Figma: Figma: the collaborative interface design tool.

text: oh my god the demo videos of this product stress me the f out

the idea of someone co-designing a screen at the same time as me, seeing someone moving something around while i’m trying to design something? I’m sure it has its benefits but the demos induce anxiety. the worst is the one where two people are modifying the anchors on a single shape :anguished:
in my head i’m like “Sean. Sean! SEAN! OMG Stop!"
